scripts.k6:post-load: npm run cleanup:data && K6_WEB_DASHBOARD=true K6_WEB_DASHBOARD_EXPORT=reports/k6/k6-post-load-$(date +'%Y-%m-%d-%H-%M-%S').html k6 run src/tests/performance/k6/post-load.js
